statements: DELETE FROM rental_payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM rental_payments WHERE amount_paid > 500 AND transaction_id IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 200 AND rental_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM rental_payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND amount_paid >= 50.00;
DELETE FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 500 AND rental_date < '2022-01-01' AND rented_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM PaymentDetails WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM RentalDetails WHERE renter_id = 150 AND rent_end_date < '2022-01-01';
